name: master-order-server
description: Express server for Master Order application

scripts.start: node setup-schema.js && npx prisma generate && node index.js
scripts.dev: node setup-schema.js && npx prisma generate && nodemon index.js
scripts.prisma:migrate: node setup-schema.js && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:deploy: node setup-schema.js && npx prisma migrate deploy
